General.Name: National Gas & Industrialization Co
General.Description: National Gas and Industrialization Company engages in the exploitation, manufacturing, and marketing of various kinds of gas and its derivatives, and industrial gases in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company manufactures, sells, and maintains cages, cylinders, tanks and accessories, and gas networks and accessories; and manufactures, transports, and markets petroleum, chemical, and petrochemical and glass products. It also establishes or participates in the production of energy, water treatment, and environmental services. In addition, the company is involved in the establishment, building, and maintenance of liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) networks and tanks; and development of LPG products and solutions. Further, it offers technical and engineering consulting services, and training related to gas and energy works; and acquires and invests in real estate, as well as purchases land for the construction of buildings for lease and sale. National Gas and Industrialization Company was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
